message: This is the first round. I'm offering you a product for $100. I want to assure you that I'm being completely transparent and honest about the quality of this product. Unfortunately, I've just discovered that this product is of low quality. I'm willing to let you know that I have a 33.33% chance of selling you a high-quality product in the future. Would you like to take a chance and buy this low-quality product for $100?
